body_html: Yes exactly. Create a fake dataset class that return tensors with random content and with length not divisible by the batch size that's going to be used. Then make sure that the last batch is indeed dropped when the flag is on, but is still returned if it's off. Thanks!

body: Yes exactly. Create a fake dataset class that return tensors with random content and with length not divisible by the batch size that's going to be used. Then make sure that the last batch is indeed dropped when the flag is on, but is still returned if it's off. Thanks!
